scripts.build-config-types: yq . < config.schema.yaml > config.schema.json && quicktype --src-lang schema config.schema.json -o packages/graphinx/src/config.ts && bun run wetzel config.schema.json -l 3 > docs/config.md
scripts.readme: sed '/^<!-- Include docs\/config.md -->$/r docs/config.md' README.template.md > README.md && cp README.md packages/graphinx
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch config.schema.yaml --exec 'bun run build-config-types' & nodemon --watch README.template.md --watch docs/ --exec 'bun run readme'
